issuetype.name: Improvement

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
*Summary:*
We need to update this module which addresses Android 12's breaking-changes.
https://developer.android.com/about/versions/12/behavior-changes-12#pending-intent-mutability

*Pending Intent Changes:*
Pass the [PendingIntent.FLAG_IMMUTABLE|https://developer.android.com/reference/android/app/PendingIntent#FLAG_IMMUTABLE] constant to the {{PendingIntent.getService()}} method call in [GeofenceModule.java|https://github.com/appcelerator-modules/ti.geofence/blob/master/android/src/ti/geofence/GeofenceModule.java] to prevent an exception from being thrown.
